title: Ckan Synchronisation Information Aspect
description: An aspect stores the information regarding sync the associated dataset with Ckan. Any changes to this aspect will trigger the sync action performed by the Ckan sync minion.

status.title: Dataset Sync Status
status.description: Indicates the desired dataset sync status. `retain`: the dataset should be created on target Ckan system and sync any changes of this dataset in registry. `withdraw`: the dataset and its associated resources should be removed from the target Ckan system.

syncUserId.title: Sync User ID
syncUserId.description: (Optional). The magda user ID that is used to perform any Ckan sync actions (including delete). System mainly use this info to determine the Ckan API key that should be used for any communications with the target Ckan system. The an API key can't be located for this user or this field doesn't exist, system should use a default API key for any Ckan sync communications for this dataset.

ckanId.title: Ckan ID
ckanId.description: (Optional); The UUID of the dataset in Ckan system (package ID). Only available after the first sync.

hasCreated.title: Has the dataset been created in Ckan
hasCreated.description: Indicates whether or not the corresponding ckan package has been created for the dataset or not.

syncRequired.title: Is Sync Required
syncRequired.description: Whether or not system should re-sync the dataset to ckan system. When the dataset is modified, this field should be set to true to trigger the backend sync process.

syncAttempted.title: Has sync attempted
syncAttempted.description: Whether or not the backend process (minion) has attempt to process the sync since last time the `syncRequired` is set to true

lastSyncAttemptTime.title: Last sync attempt time
lastSyncAttemptTime.description: (optional);The time when the backend process sync the dataset.

syncError.title: Last Sync Error
syncError.description: (optional);The error message recorded during the last backend sync processing.
